Name: Valid login with correct email and password
Steps: Navigate to the login page - Enter a valid email address - Enter the correct password - Click on the login button
Expected Result: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the dashboard

Name: Invalid login with incorrect password
Steps: Navigate to the login page - Enter a valid email address - Enter an incorrect password - Click on the login button
Expected Result: Error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials

Name: Invalid login with unregistered email
Steps: Navigate to the login page - Enter an unregistered email address - Enter any password - Click on the login button
Expected Result: Error message is displayed indicating user not found

Name: Login with empty email and password fields
Steps: Navigate to the login page - Leave the email field empty - Leave the password field empty - Click on the login button
Expected Result: Error message is displayed indicating fields cannot be empty

Name: Login with invalid email format
Steps: Navigate to the login page - Enter an invalid email format - Enter any password - Click on the login button
Expected Result: Error message is displayed indicating invalid email format

Name: Login functionality after password reset
Steps: Reset the password for a registered email - Navigate to the login page - Enter the registered email address - Enter the new password - Click on the login button
Expected Result: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the dashboard

Name: Login functionality with remembered credentials
Steps: Navigate to the login page - Check the 'Remember Me' option - Enter a valid email address - Enter the correct password - Click on the login button - Log out - Navigate back to the login page
Expected Result: Email field is pre-filled with the remembered email address
